4.3.3 The Path structure

pervasive

Function

Structure

Shell.Path

Type

val pervasive: unit -> string

Syntax

pervasive () -> path

Arguments

()

Values

path
A string.

Description

Returns the directory where the MLWorks pervasive library resides. This path is given as standard filesystem pathname rather than in the portable notation.
